name: Dauntless Hoppers
description:
Note-the downloadable file comes as the entire project, I wasn't able to Package it in Unreal as just the game file due to errors.  sorry for the inconvenience

This game is just make it from the start to the end without falling off or being caught.

It uses basic 3d platforming controls with the only addition being the "L shift" key to get a boost in speed.
